# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

FOR: Harry J & Velma B Goulding
413 N.W. 65th
Seattle, Washington
SU-2-5166

Son Harry arrived La Paz 4 April. No money, no clothes.
Can not call collect from Bolivia. Please send cable to
AmConsulate La Paz explaining what is happening. Send
money through Bank of America, La Paz Bolivia.
Stedman
